thread.title: Aid-in-dying law renews debate over definition of suicide
thread.title_full: Aid-in-dying law renews debate over definition of suicide - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kurtis Alexander
title: Aid-in-dying law renews debate over definition of suicide
text:
Photo: Max Whittaker/Prime, Special To The Chronicle Elizabeth Wallner poses for a portrait at her home in Sacramento. Wallner has been diagnosed with stage four colon cancer and is currently suing the state of California over the right of her physician to prescribe life-ending medication. Elizabeth Wallner poses for a portrait at her home in Sacramento....
When Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation last week allowing terminally ill patients to take prescription drugs to end their lives, the debate over the right to die appeared to be over. Elizabeth Wallner poses for a portrait at her home in Sacramento. Wallner has been diagnosed with stage four colon cancer and is currently suing the state of California over the right of her physician to prescribe life-ending medication. Elizabeth Wallner poses for a portrait at her home in Sacramento....
